---
title: Sign up in the Web Portal
---


1 - To create a new user you must first login as admin to the [login page](https://biodiversite-quebec.ca/fr/login)

2 - Enter the user and password. Note: The user and password  store in the coleo database. (used to access to coleo App) 

![Image](img/login.png)

3 - Go to the [signup page](https://biodiversite-quebec.ca/fr/signup)

![Image](img/signup.png)

4 - Fill all the fields and click create user button.
